General.Name: Bafang Electric Suzhou Co Ltd
General.Description: Bafang Electric (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture of e-mobility components and complete e-drive systems for e-bikes and electric scooters. It offers mid, front, rear, BBS, e-kickboard, and e-tricycle drive systems; front, mid, rear, and complete wheel motors; LED and LCD human-machine interface products; carrier mounted, intube, and frame downtube batteries, as well as chargers; speed detection and pedal sensor products; filters, sine and square wave controllers; and eb-bus, light, power, and motor extension cables. The company also provides various accessories, such as bash guards, carriers, throttles, e-brakes, chain wheels, cranks, fixation parts, handle lock nuts, chain cases, and motor covers. It offers its products in the markets, including China, Netherlands, Germany, Poland, Denmark, France, Italy, the United States of America, Japan, Taiwan, and internationally. Bafang Electric (Suzhou) Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
